Message:
When I got here,
I think the first thing
I thought was,

The air here is
so fresh and clean,
And there’s actual nature,
rich with life!

I’ve traveled to tons of
different places before,

but there aren’t many
places like this.

That’s why it surprised
the heck out of me when
the Curse started messing
things up.

How do I put it...
I guess it kinda takes me back.

You wanna hear more,
don’t ’cha? Okay, okay.
No need to rush.

Just for today,
I’ll let you in on
the true story of Soteira.
